archimate:BusinessEvent.name: Event
archimate:BusinessEvent.documentation: An event is something that happens that effects the behaviour of the system or component of the system. Events are in essence instantaneous and are by default not limited to the scope of the current component. Events can interrupt behaviour. Events are generally regarded as external influences (either external to the component/behaviour under consideration or generated by the component/behaviour to influence other aspects of the solution as a whole). Events allow a high degree of flexibility to be simply modeled but, a word of warning, powerful though they are excessive use of events can hide behaviour that is important to ensuring the success of the solution.
